title: Fix MUI v6 TypeScript Compatibility Errors
description: Update components to be compatible with MUI v6 breaking changes in Grid and MuiColorInput APIs.

stories.title: Fix MuiColorInput InputProps API
stories.description: MuiColorInput no longer accepts InputProps prop in newer versions. Need to use the new API.
tasks: Remove InputProps prop from MuiColorInput component
Use slotProps.input or equivalent new API to pass input props
Verify color picker still functions correctly
acceptanceCriteria: No TypeScript error TS2322 on ColorPicker.tsx:22
Color picker input styling works as expected
npm run typecheck passes for this file

stories.title: Migrate Grid Components to MUI v6 Grid2 API
stories.description: MUI v6 Grid component no longer uses 'item' prop and 'xs' shorthand. Need to migrate to Grid2 API using 'size' prop instead.
tasks: Replace Grid item xs={N} with Grid size={N} in IconGrid.tsx
Replace Grid item xs={N} with Grid size={N} in Icons.tsx
Replace Grid item xs={N} with Grid size={N} in Header.tsx
Remove 'item' prop from all Grid components (no longer needed in Grid2)
Optionally import Grid2 as Grid if using the new component
acceptanceCriteria: No TypeScript error TS2769 on IconGrid.tsx:21
No TypeScript error TS2769 on Icons.tsx:17
No TypeScript error TS2769 on Header.tsx:15
npm run typecheck passes for all affected files

IconGrid.tsx:21 TS2769.issue: Grid item/xs props replaced with size in MUI v6

Icons.tsx:17 TS2769.issue: Grid item/xs props replaced with size in MUI v6

Header.tsx:15 TS2769.issue: Grid item/xs props replaced with size in MUI v6

gridV2Changes: Replace xs={N} with size={N} or size={{ xs: N }}
Replace sm={N}, md={N}, etc with size={{ sm: N, md: N }}
Container prop still works the same way
muiColorInputChanges: Check MuiColorInput docs for current API

testingRequirements: npm run typecheck passes with 0 errors
Icon grid displays icons in correct layout
All affected UI components render properly
